review_blob: Such a complex flavor. The spiciness of a Belgian Triple with the hops of an IPA. Absolutely delicious.
Best stout I've ever had on tap. Coffee and chocolate flavor that doesn't overpower the dark deliciousness of the beer itself
Delicious. Everything I like about a porter. Chocolate and coffee notes came through and after pouring the beer had a great looking and tasting head on it.
I've had the smoked porter and loved it. The vanilla addition to this was a bit too reminiscent in taste to vanilla skoal. Not a huge fan.
Great ipa. Deliciously hoppy, great taste with the rye. Totally drinkable and a step up from their torpedo
Great dark wintery beer. Smooth and drinkable with a great depth of flavor. Not super hoppy considering it's an IPA
